content.rendered:
The district recently held a virtual Canvas Training for families.  The 1-hour training walks 6th – 12th grade parents and guardians through how Canvas is being used in classrooms to support instruction.  Features of Canvas that will be reviewed are: course navigation buttons, home pages, announcements, modules, assignments, and the Canvas calendar.  The training also explains how guardians can become observers of their student’s Canvas course. 

Watch the recording.
